title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Overseas Program Support

description.narrative: Overseas program support costs in Montenegro. Includes overseas staff salaries and benefit costs, leases, staff travel, communications, conferences, supplies, equipment and International Cooperative Administrative Support Services (ICASS). Excludes costs for training, medical and security.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Medical Support

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Montenegro. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Medical Support

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Montenegro directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
